mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARDTBL WHERE BRD_CODE = #{brd_code} AND BRD_DELETE = 1
SELECT * FROM BOARDTBL WHERE BRD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{brd_title}, '%') AND BRD_DELETE = 1
SELECT * FROM BOARDTBL WHERE BRD_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{brd_content}, '%') AND BRD_DELETE = 1
SELECT * FROM BOARDTBL WHERE CLS_CODE = #{cls_code} AND BRD_DELETE = 1
SELECT * FROM BOARDTBL WHERE BRD_CATEGORY = #{brd_category} AND BRD_DELETE = 1
SELECT * FROM BOARDTBL WHERE MEM_CODE = #{mem_code} AND BRD_DELETE = 1
SELECT * FROM BOARDTBL WHERE BRD_RATING = #{brd_rating} AND BRD_DELETE = 1
SELECT * FROM BOARDTBL INNER JOIN COMMENTTBL ON BOARDTBL.BRD_CODE = COMMENTTBL.BRD_CODE WHERE COMMENTTBL.CMT_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cmt_content}, '%') AND BOARDTBL.BRD_DELETE = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDTBL (BRD_TITLE, BRD_HIT, BRD_DATE, BRD_CONTENT, MEM_CODE, CLS_CODE, BRD_CATEGORY, BRD_DELETE, BRD_RATING) VALUES (#{brd_title}, 0, NOW(), #{brd_content}, #{mem_code}, #{cls_code}, #{brd_category}, 1, #{brd_rating})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDTBL SET BRD_TITLE = #{brd_title}, BRD_HIT = #{brd_hit}, BRD_CONTENT = #{brd_content}, CLS_CODE = #{cls_code}, BRD_CATEGORY = #{brd_category}, BRD_RATING = #{brd_rating} WHERE BRD_CODE = #{brd_code}
UPDATE BOARDTBL SET BRD_DELETE = 0 WHERE BRD_CODE = #{brd_code}
